summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the CFMS Replacement Project; establishing and abrogating positions in the 1987 Budget of the Office of the City Comptroller and providing payment therefor; authorizing the City Comptroller and Purchasing Agent jointly to conduct a competitive process to select a new automated financial management system and establishing the Women-owned and Minority-owned Business Enterprise (WMBE) participation percentages for the acquisition of the financial management system.
